title: [Elaraeyn's Boutique]
description: Rich jewel-toned lengths of velvet conceal the walls along this part of the shop, the surroundings becoming more intimate and cozy.  Outerwear for body and head have been displayed here, in all the newest fashions and colors.

Sheets of vellum and parchment decorate the vanilla-hued walls, the papers covered in sketches of various fashions in a myriad of vivid colors.  Well-organized piles of fabric and vials of dye are arranged neatly against the walls, each labeled item placed within a tall metal filigree display.
